sentences.sContent: Challenge yourself academically, but give yourself plenty of time for fun as well.
sentences.sContent_eng: Challenge yourself academically, but give yourself plenty of time for fun as well.
sentences.sCn: 学业上要努力，但也要给自己充足的娱乐时间。

sentences.sContent: "Research in the UK shows those born at the start of the school year also do better academically and have more confidence," he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Research in the UK shows those born at the start of the school year also do better academically and have more confidence," he said.
sentences.sCn: 班纳还说道：“英国的研究人员还发现，在学校学年开始时出生的人，会在学术上表现得较好，而且他们也更有自信。”
